item.title: Small Room Beats 5 Mixed By D.J. Charles G - Toronto
item.description: Hey everyone I am very happy to bring you Small Room Beats 5 a mixed set of chilled out house music tunes. I really hope you enjoy this installment don't worry as always commercial and talk free just great beats from talented artists. If you like what you hear please follow me on facebook I'm easy to find Charles G or Dj Charles G. If you are in Toronto you can catch me at Insomnia 563 Bloor St W. Track Listing ( Don't forget if you like these tracks please buy them) 1. Thyladonmid & Adriatique 2. Roni Be - Once & Again 3. Reel People Tony Momrell - Golden Lady Louie Vega 4. Hat + Hoodie - Gimme Some 5. Danny Tenaglia - Lemon 6. So Long Most Rated 7. Yesterday Original Feat Shawnee Taylor 8. Reeling 9. Africanism All Stars Enfants du bled 10. Kenya
item.dc:creator: Charles G
item.itunes:summary:

1. Thyladonmid & Adriatique 2. Roni Be - Once & Again 3. Reel People Tony Momrell - Golden Lady Louie Vega 4. Hat + Hoodie - Gimme Some 5. Danny Tenaglia - Lemon 6. So Long Most Rated 7. Yesterday Original Feat Shawnee Taylor 8. Reeling 9. Africanism All Stars Enfants du bled 10. Kenya

item.title: Small Room Beats 4 Mixed By D.J. Charles G - Toronto
item.description: Small Room Beats 4 Mixed By D.J. Charles G - Toronto Welcome to another installment of small room beats tunes for you to chill or groove to as the case maybe If you enjoy it please to spread the word and join me on my fan page DJ Charles G on facebook.

Small Room Beats 4 Mixed By D.J. Charles G - Toronto
Welcome to another installment of small room beats tunes for you to chill or groove to as the case maybe If you enjoy it please to spread the word and join me on my fan page DJ Charles G on facebook.

item.title: BIG ROOM BEATS 7 Mixed By Dj Charles G Toronto
item.description: BIG ROOM BEATS 7 Mixed By Dj Charles G Toronto Hello everyone it is a hot fab day here in Toronto and so it must be time for Big Room Beats 7 this sessions takes things up notch and gives you fun pumping beats to get you through a hot summer day....So except no fakes The True Big Room Beats are back on for your pleasure :) 1. Bangduck - Moguai Remix 2. Knick Knack - Jon Rundell 3. Fresh 1 Night - Sharam Jey Pres Soundz 4. Pressure - Nadia Ali Starkillers And Alex Kenji 5. Sine Laanguage - Oliver Lang 6. Dovergubben - Zedd 7. Around The World Party Rock intro 8. Sebastian Krieg - Rei 9. David Guetta - Little Bad Girl 10. Donkey Punch - Hatras, Jelo 11. Hit Back - Inpetto 12. You've got the love - Florence And The Machine Mark Knight

item.title: Small Room Beats 3 Mixed By D.J. Charles G - Toronto
item.description: I thought it was time once more for something more chilled...Small Room Beats 3 a collection of deep house music made by various artists and mixed by yours truly. No Commercials just sit back and get lost in it. All I ask is that you please follow me and ask you friends to tunes. 1.Agoria - souless dearmer 2.Goreg - Imara Laipin & Tjoma Rework 3.Vozmediano - El Che 4.Agaric - Run Ostem Jam 5.The Timewriter - Wasteland 6.Bruno from ibiza its your time (dub) 7.Marcin Czubala - Loose The Man 8.dj_roland_clark joe 9christos fourkis - about me Join me on facebook Charles G

item.title: BIG ROOM BEATS 6 Mixed By Dj Charles G Toronto
item.description: Hey everyone back by popular demand I'm sending another Big Room Beats into the world I'm so happy with all the great feedback and welcome more. Please join me on facebook and if you happen to be in Toronto say hello. Big Room Beats 6 features the following artists below with no commercials or talking from me just pure beats made by talented people. Hope you enjoy :) Julien Jabre Swimming Places (Tom Shark Presents La Cage Remix) Richard Dinsdale - Dj You've Got My Love (Original Club Mix) Chris Lake Secrets In The Dark Mark Knight - Devil Walking Dada Life White Noise Red Meat Sandy Rivera & Rae Hide U Remix Racheael Starr To Forever Black Rose Anthem Mastiksoul Yakuba Luis Sastre nino cubano Ozgur Can Clean Slate Hector Couto Sweet Times (2011)
item.dc:creator: Charles G

item.title: Dj Charles G - Toronto - Canada Dirty Beats Pt 1
item.description: Greetings everyone it's 2011 and I think it's time for some dirty beats to start the new year on the right foot. Here is wishing all of you peace and a excellent new year. If you like my set please feel free to spread the word and or join me on facebook. Ps...also a buck or two in the change box won't hurt either....wink...wink....nudge...nudge. ::D
item.dc:creator: Charles G
item.itunes:summary:
Greetings everyone it's 2011 and I think it's time for some dirty beats to start the new year on the right foot. Here is wishing all of you peace and a excellent new year. If you like my set please feel free to spread the word and or join me on facebook.
Ps...also a buck or two in the change box won't hurt either....wink...wink....nudge...nudge. ::D

item.title: BiG ROOM BEATS 5 Mixed By Dj Charles G Toronto
item.description: Hello everyone I thought it was time for another Big Room Beat So Big Room Beats 5 is Just a little gift from me to you to keep your fall a groovy one 1. Hypontized - Oliver Koletzki feat. Fran 2. Locongas (Jay Lumen Rework) Chase Buch & Nick Olivetti 3. Cantate (Lalai Lala) 4. Clouds Across The Moon Rah Band 5. Hey Hey Denns Ferrer (John Jacobsen) 6. Superstring Sol Noir (Dave Darell Remix) 7. HouseBeat Spencer & Hill 8. Gotta Move Koen Groenveld & Addy Van Zwan 9. Stromae - Alors on Danse Luis S Remix 10. Sink It Back (Plastic Funk's) Beautiful Beat Girls 11. The Red Room (Obj Vocal) Dennis Ferrer 12. Open Your Eyes Again Phonejaxx

item.title: Small Room Beats 2
item.description: This is a bit of a mixed bag of house styles starts off pretty vocal and beautiful it picks up as it goes along to bring you to comfy place where you can simply relax and enjoy. 1. lips feat.bongi mvuyana - time is now (groove assassin remix 2. nu phonic feat charvoni no more heartache 3. cookie monsterz and michelle weeks - spread love 4. Neuroxyde - Doomwork - Jazzy Stuff Original Mix 5. Martin Solveia Potimistic 6. La Pena - Divino Canto 7. Are you going to go my way 2010 mix 8. Orian Nilsen - La Guitarra 9. Funkagenda - breakwater 10. Dave Kurtis - Last Night In Miami (Dave Kurtis Remix) 11. Luis Sastre - Sunny (Remix) side note a wicked Toronto Producer check him out!!!! 12. Wattie Green - Sea lion woman remix
item.dc:creator: Charles G

item.title: Sexy Small Room Beats
item.description: A groovy collection of deep house tunes with a splash of vocals at the end to relax you from a hard day at work or a nice long drive hope you enjoy it. 1. Luckystars - swimming under ipwire and gavin froome 2. Pete Dafeat - Lungs - Fred Everything VS frederico 3. Hanfry Martinez - come here josele (alex rogue remix) 4. Osunlade - Momma's Groove (Jimsters) 5. Fer Ferrari Essential Bit Of Piano (Club Mix) 6. Kerri Chandler Revisited 7. Ralf Gum Ft Akira Dee Everything u r Ralph Gum & Crisp Splendid Dub 8. Light 4 Lines Feat Susanna Montero 9. A Man Called Adam Love Forgotten (Rav Roc Latino Soul mix) 10. Sade Soldier Of Love (Jason B Remix)
item.dc:creator: Charles G
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: BIG ROOM BEATS 3 Mixed By Dj Charles G Toronto
item.description: As with the other Big Room Beats mixes this offering was made for all you grooving in those dark underground spaces. I truly hope you enjoy and please share it around if you do. 1. federico milani - weakness 2. autistic - my technique 3. el chiavator marshall aka luigi rocca 4. david guetta - grrrr 5. John Dahlback - blink (d.o.n.s & DBN Chainsaw Remix 6. London Fm Urbansound 7. Sebastien Leger Bubbly 8. Fedde le Grand - Praise You (Fatboy Slim Vs. Fedde Le Grand Remix) 9. Tiesto Louder Than Boom 10. Gui Boratto - No Turning Back 11. Kaskade & Deadmau5 Move For Me ( Extended)

item.title: Groovy and Funky
item.description: Hey everyone it's been a while since I've had a chance to post a mix but I've something groovy for you now hope you enjoy it. 1.doubles lowlow 2.i am guera can't go for dat union 3.mettle music collective fantasy sax dub 4.marvellis_solarbowlsforestavery guest house 5.d-t3ch_unseenthingsonnyfodera_mindtravel 6.moesyzlak lovely theb sharp 7.mario dubbz jackos revenge bueno booty 8.dj sneak the blast off 9.dimas and martinez dub a flute 10.random soul see it for yourself random soul

item.title: BIG ROOM HOUSE BEATS 2
item.description: BIG ROOM HOUSE BEATS 2 HOPE YOU ENJOY MY NEW MIX FOR NOVEMBER 1.Something for your mind sfym (mike marten) 2.Tom Le Mont Feat Starship we built this city (viron Ltd Electronic Remix) 3.This is sick (Grooovenatics remix) 4.STFU Dirty Disco 5.Massivedrum feat. dilek and pm 6.Britney Spears Wolfgang Gartner Extended Mix 7.Night Flight I Rock Your Night (Slin Project Remix) 8.Cunnie Williams Feat Monie Love Saturday 2009 (Alex Gaudino And Jason Rooney Remix) 9.say what x-press 10.solarianism 11.John Dalback autumna 12.reboot enjoy music 13.michel cleis featuring toto la momposina la mezcia roog edit 14.atfc the conversation (atfcs conversation killer) 15,martijin_ten _velden and _afro boogie_cowbell
